import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Base from './Base' import getProducts from "./helper/Coreapicalls"; import {useParams} from "react-router-dom" const Product= ()=> { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); const [error, setError] = useState(false); const {productId} = useParams() const thisProduct = products.filter(prod => prod.id === productId) useEffect(() => { loadallProducts(); }, []); const loadallProducts = () => { getProducts().then((data) => { if (data && data.error) { setError(data.error); console.log(error); } else { setProducts(data); } }); }; return (
{/*---- Include the above in your HEAD tag --------*/}
